headline: Robinhood Shares Ride Crypto Boom Back to Record Highs
summary: (Bloomberg) -- Nearly four years after its much-hyped debut, Robinhood Markets Inc. has finally seen its shares hit a fresh record as cryptocurrency markets rally.Most Read from BloombergWhere the Wild Children’s Museums AreBillionaire Steve Cohen Wants NY to Expand Taxpayer-Backed FerryThe Global Struggle to Build Safer CarsAt London’s New Design Museum, Visitors Get Hands-On AccessLA City Council Passes Budget That Trims Police, Fire SpendingThe stock rose 5.5% to close at $71.72 on Tuesday. headline: Robinhood (HOOD) Shares Skyrocket, What You Need To Know
summary: Shares of financial services company Robinhood (NASDAQ:HOOD) jumped 6.3% in the afternoon session after stocks edged higher (Nasdaq +0.9%, S&P +0.6%) while momentum in the crypto space picked up amid concerns the proposed spending bill (One Big Beautiful Bill) would raise the already bloated US fiscal deficit, making it difficult to keep inflation under control.

headline: Robinhood Stock Climbs on Crypto Acquisition
summary: Robinhood stock is poised to close at an all-time high today, with investors cheering news of an acquisition that expands the company’s crypto business.  The brokerage announced Monday after the close that it had completed its previously announced acquisition of the crypto exchange Bitstamp.  The deal allows Robinhood to serve institutional crypto clients and expands its crypto offerings internationally, the company said.

headline: Bitcoin Price Rises. Don’t Get Excited Just Yet.
summary: Bitcoin  was rising in afternoon trading Tuesday, but the cryptocurrency still can’t manage to avieve escape velocity.  Bitcoin rose 2.1% over the last 24 hours to $106,482, according to CoinDesk data.  Despite Tuesday’s rise, bitcoin hasn’t been able to break out.

headline: Broadcom's all-time high, CVS investment, Robinhood & Bitstamp
summary: Yahoo Finance host Brad Smith tracks today's top moving stocks and biggest market stories in this Market Minute, including Broadcom (AVGO) shares hitting an all-time high ahead of its earnings this Thursday, CVS Health (CVS) revealed plans to invest $20 billion to modernize American healthcare, and Robinhood Markets (HOOD) completing its acquisition of European crypto exchange Bitstamp. Stay up to date on the latest market action, minute-by-minute, with Yahoo Finance's Market Minute.

headline: Robinhood Completes $200M Acquisition of Crypto Exchange Bitstamp
summary: The deal, which was first announced in June of last year, gives Robinhood an entry into the global crypto trading market, both retail and institutional

headline: Bitcoin Price Falls. Why Analysts See Crypto Volatility Ahead.
summary: Bitcoin  fell slightly as other cryptocurrencies rose early Tuesday, while the stock market looked set to open lower.  The price of the world’s largest digital coin was down 0.2% over the last 24 hours to $105,286, according to CoinDesk data.  Ether  rose 4.2% to $2,615, and the second largest coin by market value is now up about 40% in the past 30 days.
